ModMetaData.name: Restricted Storage
ModMetaData.author: Little White Mouse
ModMetaData.description:
Restricted Storage allows you to restrict who can take things FROM storage.
THIS MOD IS A WORK IN PROGRESS, but I thought I would share.
In the vanilla game, "storage" means Shelves. I use this with Deep Storage (my favorite storage mod, it's really awesome) but it should work with any storage buildings out there!
(Sad muffalos not included)
